review: I love this.  It is so easy to use.  I had purchased another item like this and could never get it to work.  I plugged in my fire stick and it took me right to a instruction screen on my TV and setting everything up was a breeze.  I would recommend this to others for sure.
author: Janet Shute

review: Great device for enjoying television. Love it.

review: I love being able to use Prime Video and Netflix through the Fire Stick. The interface is great and easy to use.The only problem I am having (which I haven't check to see if there is a fix yet) is that it sometimes drops the network connection in the middle of streaming and needs to be reset. It's really annoying.

review: It has a tough time picking up my wifi sometimes. I had intended to switch it between my grandkids' bedrooms but it was easier to buy one for each than to try to get it to recognize wifi every time I moved it. I also have the box version and it works perfectly every time no matter where I hook it up. The wifi reception on the Stick is much weaker and less reliable than the box.
